The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Interactive Email

Also known as: Kinetic Email

An email in which a subscriber can take an action within the email that will then change the layout or content that same email. Usually works using various CSS hacks.

Additional Resources

  • What is interactive email?, Designmodo
  • How to Make Your Emails More Interactive, HubSpot
  • Interactive Emails: 5 Exciting Ideas and Examples to Try, Email on Acid
  • Interactive Email for Beginners: 6 Interactive Elements You Can Add to Your Emails Today, Litmus
